5.caption_en:
Caption: A blank "Platform Service Canvas v3.0" template for mapping stakeholder motivations, touchpoints, platform services and success factors, with a central lifecycle ring showing Onboard, Match, Transact and Engage stages. The sheet includes left and right vertical sections for motivations, resources and relationships, and a bottom area for expectations and satisfaction drivers.

6.caption_en:
Caption:
A slide titled "Platform Service Canvas" showing three canvas thumbnails around a central diagram that maps a platform to stakeholder segments (consumers, producers, partners, owner). The slide states the tool helps define user journeys and identify services needed to improve the platform experience for each stakeholder.

{
  "artifact_type": "presentation_slide",
  "title": "Platform Service Canvas",
  "caption": "A slide titled \"Platform Service Canvas\" showing three canvas thumbnails around a central diagram that maps a platform to stakeholder segments (consumers, producers, partners, owner). The slide states the tool helps define user journeys and identify services needed to improve the platform experience for each stakeholder.",
  "language": "English",
  "primary_text_excerpt": "Helps you to define the user journey for the different stakeholder segments (consumers, producers, partners) and to identify appropriate services you need to provide to enhance the experience on the platform for all of them.",
  "stakeholder_segments": [
    "Consumers",
    "Producers",
    "Partners",
    "Owner"
  ],
  "central_element": "Platform",
  "visual_elements": [
    "three small Platform Service Canvas thumbnails (top-left, top-right, bottom-left)",
    "central circular platform diagram with colored stakeholder nodes and bidirectional arrows",
    "explanatory text block on the right"
  ],
  "purpose": "Tool to define user journeys for stakeholder segments and identify services to enhance platform experience",
  "dominant_colors": [
    "light blue",
    "gray",
    "teal",
    "green",
    "orange",
    "coral"
  ],
  "layout_summary": "Title at top-left, three canvas thumbnails arranged around a central diagram in the middle, explanatory paragraph at lower-right."
}
